skills.name: Moonsilver Blade
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Innate:}} {{ci|Diana}} gains {{as|{{sti|attack speed}}}}, increased shortly after casting an ability.
Every third basic attack in quick succession will cleave nearby enemies, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Diana''' gains {{as|{{sti|attack speed|{{pp|15 to 40|1;3 to 18 by 3|key=%}} '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}. After casting an [[champion ability|ability]], this bonus is tripled to {{pp|15*3 to 40*3|1;3 to 18 by 3|key=%|color=as}} for 3 seconds.

'''Diana's''' [[basic attacks]] {{tip|on-hit}} grant a [[stack]] for {{fd|3.5}} seconds, stacking up to 2 times, and refreshing the duration upon receiving the second stack. At 2 stacks, '''Diana's''' next basic attack {{tip|on-hit}} consumes the stacks to additionally cleave nearby enemies, dealing them {{as|{{pp|20+5*(x-1) for 5; then + 5 + 10*x for 5; then + 10 + 15*x for 5; then + 10 + 20*x}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}}. ''Moonsilver Blade'' deals 300% damage against non-{{tip|monster|epic monsters}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Diana gains 1;3 to 18 by 3 ‒ undefined bonus attack speed. After casting an champion ability, this bonus is tripled to 1;3 to 18 by 3 ‒ undefined for 3 seconds.
Diana's basic attacks on-hit grant a stack for 3.5 seconds, stacking up to 2 times, and refreshing the duration upon receiving the second stack. At 2 stacks, Diana's next basic attack on-hit consumes the stacks to additionally cleave nearby enemies, dealing them 20+5*(x-1) for 5; then + 5 + 10*x for 5; then + 10 + 15*x for 5; then + 10 + 20*xundefined − (based on level) (+ 40% AP) magic damage. Moonsilver Blade deals 300% damage against non-epic monsters.
skills.notes:
* ''Moonsilver Blade'' will affect [[structures]].
* Each attack has a distinct animation and she will glow when the empowered attack is ready.

skills.name: Crescent Strike
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Diana}} unleashes a bolt of lunar energy that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit in an arc before exploding at the target location.
Enemies hit are marked with ''Moonlight'', {{tip|sight|revealing}} them.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Diana''' unleashes a bolt of lunar energy that travels in a counter-clockwise arc before exploding at the target location, briefly granting {{tip|sight}} of the area and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit and afflicting them with ''Moonlight'' for 3 seconds, {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for the duration.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Diana unleashes a bolt of lunar energy that travels in a counter-clockwise arc before exploding at the target location, briefly granting sight of the area and dealing magic damage to enemies hit and afflicting them with Moonlight for 3 seconds, revealing them for the duration.
Moonlight has interactions with Diana's Lunar Rush.
skills.notes:
* The tip of the arc grants {{tip|sight}} briefly.
* Even if the target {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}} the bolt, they may still be damaged by the explosion. ''Moonlight'' is not applied to the protected target if blocked.
* ''Crescent Strike'' will cast from wherever '''Diana''' is at the end of the cast time.
** If the ability is cast at max range and she is moved backwards while casting, the bolt will travel to the target location with increased distance.{{bug}}

skills.name: Pale Cascade
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Diana}} {{tip|shield|shields}} herself, creating three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal {{as|magic damage}} in an area.
If all the spheres detonate, she gains more {{tip|shield}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Diana''' {{tip|shields}} herself for up to 5 seconds and creates three spheres that orbit her for the duration, detonating upon contact with an enemy and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies upon detonation.
If all three spheres detonate, ''Pale Cascade's'' shield is reapplied, stacking with its original shield and refreshing the duration.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Diana shields herself for up to 5 seconds and creates three spheres that orbit her for the duration, detonating upon contact with an enemy and dealing magic damage to nearby enemies upon detonation.
If all three spheres detonate, Pale Cascade's shield is reapplied, stacking with its original shield and refreshing the duration.
leveling: {{st|Shield Strength|{{ap|30 to 90}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' health)}}|Total Shield Strength|{{ap|30*2 to 90*2}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' health)}}}}{{st|Magic Damage per Orb|{{ap|18 to 66}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|18*3 to 66*3}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* On the second application of ''Pale Cascade's'' shield, {{sti|Shield Power|link = Heal and shield power}} will apply to both the new shield amount and the shield amount remaining from the first shield, which has already benefited from ''shield power''.
** Because of this, ''shield power'' effectively applies to the second shield twice, but with reduced efficiency, for up to an increase of 50% of ''shield power'' (maximum benefit if no damage was mitigated by the first shield). With 10% ''shield power'', the second shield's total amount will be increased by up to an additional 5%, for a total of {{tt|{{fd|15.5%}}|1.1*1.05}} '''bonus''' shield.
** The formula for the total amount of shield '''Diana''' will receive from both shield applications is:
*** ''Total Shield = (((Shield Amount × (1 + Shield Power)) - Damage Blocked by Shield) + Shield Amount) × (1 + Shield Power)''

effects.str:
• Shield Strength: (+ 30% AP) (+ 10% bonus health)
  • Total Shield Strength: (+ 60% AP) (+ 20% bonus health)
  • Magic Damage per Orb: (+ 15% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 45% AP)

skills.name: Lunar Rush
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Diana}} {{tip|dash|dashes}} to an enemy and deals {{as|magic damage}}.
If used on a target afflicted with {{ai|Crescent Strike|Diana|''Moonlight''}}, the cooldown is massively {{sti|ah|reduced}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Diana''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy's location, and upon completion, she deals them {{as|magic damage}} and consumes {{ai|Crescent Strike|Diana|Moonlight}} from all enemies. If the target is within 400 range, '''Diana''' will dash through their location.
If ''Moonlight'' is consumed from the target or they die mid-dash while being afflicted by ''Moonlight'', ''Lunar Rush's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced to {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''Diana''' can cast any of her abilities during ''Lunar Rush''.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Diana dashes to the target enemy's location, and upon completion, she deals them magic damage and consumes Diana's Moonlight from all enemies. If the target is within 400 range, Diana will dash through their location.
If Moonlight is consumed from the target or they die mid-dash while being afflicted by Moonlight, Lunar Rush's cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds.
Diana can cast any of her abilities during Lunar Rush.
skills.notes:
* '''Diana''' will attempt to basic attack the target. This will not grant a stack of {{ri|Conqueror}}, {{ri|Electrocute}}, {{ri|Phase Rush}} or {{ii|Spellthief's Edge}}.
* ''Lunar Rush'' consumes ''Moonlight'' upon ending the dash (even if {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}).
* ''Lunar Rush'' will still deal damage even if the target is {{tip|untargetable}} by the end of the dash.
* If ''Lunar Rush'' is blocked by {{tip|spell shield}} the ''Moonlight'' debuff is still consumed but ''Lunar Rush's'' cooldown is not reset.

skills.name: Moonfall
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Diana}} {{tip|airborne|draws}} in and {{tip|slow|slows}} nearby enemies.
If she pulls an enemy {{tip|champion}}, she calls down a beam of moonlight to strike upon the area after a delay, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, increased if she pulled more champions.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} {{tip|sight|Reveals}} and {{tip|airborne|draws in}} all nearby enemies, and successively {{tip|slow|slows}} them for 2 seconds.

If '''Diana''' pulls an enemy {{tip|champion}}, she calls down a beam of moonlight to strike upon the area around her after 1 second, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies, increased for each champion pulled beyond the first.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Reveals and draws in all nearby enemies, and successively slows them for 2 seconds.
If Diana pulls an enemy champion, she calls down a beam of moonlight to strike upon the area around her after 1 second, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies, increased for each champion pulled beyond the first.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Damage Per Champion|{{ap|35 to 85}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}}|Total Damage Vs. 5 Champions|{{ap|200+35*4 to 400+85*4}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* Enemies stay in the area for a maximum of approximately {{fd|0.5}} seconds while being pulled.
* {{tip|cc-immune|Crowd control immunity}} and {{tip|displacement immunity}} still count as being "pulled in" by the ability.
* {{tip|clone|Clones}} count as champions for increasing this ability's damage.
** The damage is not capped at pulling 5 enemy champions - if ''Moonfall'' affects additional clones or {{tip|hexakill|champions}}, the bonus damage increases even more.
* The beam of moonlight does not crash down if champions hit blocked the initial effect with {{tip|spell shield}}.
** Enemy champions protected by ''spell shield'' do not count towards the damage increase.
* ''Moonfall'' will cast from wherever '''Diana''' is at the end of the cast time.
* A lunar phase of the moon will appear above '''Diana''' while she is casting ''Moonfall'', each phase is based on the number of enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} pulled:
<gallery navigation=true widths="80px">
New_Moon_Moonfall_(1_Enemy_Champion).png|{{sbc|New Moon:}} '''1''' Enemy Champion Pulled
Waning_Crescent_Moonfall_(2_Enemy_Champions).png|{{sbc|Waning Crescent:}} '''2''' Enemy Champions Pulled
Third_Quarter_Moonfall_(3_Enemy_Champions).png|{{sbc|Third Quarter:}} '''3''' Enemy Champions Pulled
Waning_Gibbous_Moonfall_(4_Enemy_Champions).png|{{sbc|Waning Gibbous:}} '''4''' Enemy Champions Pulled
Full_Moon_Moonfall_(5_Enemy_Champions).png|{{sbc|Full Moon:}} '''5''' Enemy Champions Pulled
</gallery>

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 60% AP)
  • Bonus Damage Per Champion: (+ 15% AP)
  • Total Damage Vs. 5 Champions: (+ 120% AP)
